paper_abstract: In a bilevel decision problem, both the leader and the follower may have multiple objectives, and the coefficients involved in these objective functions or constraints may be described by some uncertain values. To express such a situation, a fuzzy multi-objective bilevel (FMOBL) programming model and related solution methods are introduced. This research develops a FMOBL decision support system through implementing the proposed FMOBL methods.
paper_title: A FUZZY MULTI-OBJECTIVE BILEVEL DECISION SUPPORT SYSTEM
